p: During the last observation on day 20, wound healing was almost complete in the positive control and aqueous latex fraction groups. In the negative control (placebo) group treated with glycerin, the lesions were completely closed, as were the case for the chloroform and ethyl acetate latex fraction groups, but the hair regrowth was incomplete ( Figure-1). These results indicate that the aqueous latex extract and the A-derma Â® positive control promoted wound healing with similar efficacies.
